rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CIV3247}
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-TRANS, MAE-WATER, MAEINFRA01, MAETRAN01, MAEWATR01} Otherwise true

description: Review of soil mechanics model; the geological context of a project; site investigation and laboratory testing techniques; conceptual design of foundations; elastic, consolidation and creep settlement of shallow footings; total and differential settlement; bearing capacity of shallow footings of layered soils; raft foundations; piling options; the relationship between construction techniques and pile performance; axial capacity of single piles in compression and tension; settlement of single piles; capacity and settlement of pile groups; piled rafts; lateral capacity of piles; rational methods for design of rock-socketed piles; static, dynamic, statnamic and integrity testing of piles.
